name: admin.conversations.create
desc: Create a public or private channel-based conversation.

description.desc: Description of the public or private channel to create.

is_private.desc: When `true`, creates a private channel instead of a public channel.

name.desc: Name of the public or private channel to create.

org_wide.desc: When `true`, the channel will be available org-wide. Note: if the channel is not `org_wide=true`, you must specify a `team_id` for this channel.

team_id.desc: The workspace to create the channel in. Note: this argument is required unless you set `org_wide=true`.

errors.could_not_create_channel: The channel could not be created.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The token provided doesn't have access to this method.
errors.invalid_name: The value passed for `name` was invalid.
errors.name_taken: A channel cannot be created with the given name.
errors.no_local_user_on_team: The workspace provided had no users.
errors.restricted_action: A workspace preference prevents the authenticated user from creating channels.
errors.team_id_or_org_required: You must provide a `team_id` or set `org_wide` to `true`.
errors.team_not_found: No workspace was found for the `team_id` provided.
